songs.title: Allah duhai hai
songs.lyrics:
Tera tha mera hi main har dafa
Tujhi pe mita hoon hun kari na tabaah
Hai aata maza ishq mein tabhi
Beparwah hoke tu bhi hoja mujhpe tabaah

Jhoothi mohabbat teri zaroorat
Badi zaleel sataana wah teri adaa
Nasha… tera…
Nasha… nashila nashila hai

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafai hai
Mushqil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyar mein

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafai hai
Mushqil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyar mein

Kaise main maanu jo ye dil de raha gawahi
Teri farebi aankhon se bachaye illahi
Masoom chehre mein chhupa ek hi raaz hai
Race meri saanson ki le aayegi tabahi

Sukoon bhi tu
Nasha bhi tu
Hai shauq bhi mera
Hai sir pe chadha junoon hai tera

Sukoon bhi tu
Nasha bhi tu
Hai shauq bhi mera
Hai sir pe chadha junoon hai tera

Nasha… tera…
Nasha… nashila nashila hai

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafai hai
Mushqil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyar mein

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafai hai
Mushqil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyar mein

Allah…

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafaayi hai
Mushkil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyaar mein

Allah duhai hai
Phir bewafaayi hai
Mushkil rihaai hai
Haan tere pyaar mein
